proj-intro-1: We help companies strategize for the
proj-intro-1-1: Southeast Asian market, and stay ahead in design, technology, and marketing.
proj-intro-2: Digital technology is steadily spreading across Southeast Asia, with digital channels becoming the core means of customer communication as well as product and service sales.
proj-intro-3: I.O.B focuses on digital channels to execute projects aimed at attracting customers and increasing sales. For the sustainable growth of businesses, we establish infrastructures for data collection and analysis throughout the project and provide data-driven decision-making support.
digital-1: Starting from market research and strategy formulation, we provide all the necessary solutions for digital channel operations, including design, development, and marketing.
digital-2: Our goal is to enable companies to strategically enter the Southeast Asian market and create synergies among various functional units under the same objective.
digital-3: Building each organization separately for strategy, design, development, and marketing requires significant time and resources for hiring, vendor exploration, and project management.
digital-4: I.O.B projects integrate and manage these processes, maximizing the return on investment for companies entering new markets.
assembling-team: ASSEMBLING THE RIGHT TEAM FOR YOU
assembling-team-1: We form an optimal team based on the company's services/products, business objectives, competitive environment, and project tasks, and then begin the work.
assembling-team-2: To successfully accomplish diverse tasks spanning multiple stages, we leverage experts from Southeast Asian countries and our network of companies.
assembling-team-3: I.O.B. manages the entire project, working and communicating with the client as one cohesive team.
message-placeholder: Please provide a brief overview of your project and the support you need from us.
